sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Odunze Vivian ji mkpụrụanya ya abụọ ahụ ụzọ oge ọ pụtara ụwa.
Mana ọ bụ oge ọ dị na nwata ka ọ ṅụrụ ọgwụ mebiri emebi nke buteere ya ikpu isi.
Blind Mechanic: Ekpuru m isi mana onweghị onye ka m arụ ọrụ inginia
Oluebube mere mgbe anyị na-amụpụta nwa Agaezi- Dọkịta
Blind Baker: Lee nwaanyị kpuru isi na-eme achịcha bekee
Oteghị aka nke a mechara, nna ya hapụrụ ya na nne ya lụọ nwaanyị ọzọ.
N'agbanyeghị ihe ndị a, Odunze Vivian ṅụrụ iyi na ọ ga-agụrịrị akwụkwọ.
Chineke zara ya ekpere site n'enyemaka ndị mmadụ nakwa nke 'Bethesda School for the Blind'.
Ugbua, Odunze Vivian bụ nwata akwụkwọ na mahadum 'University of Lagos', ma bụrụkwa onye nkuzi na  'Bethesda School for the Blind'.
Gere akụkọ ya n'uju.
Ụmụnyanyị
Ọmụmụ na mmụta
